CustomField.description: This field demonstrates the Referral Type as calculated directly from the data within Salesforce, unlike the main Referral Type field that is calculated from data in the WAR system.
CustomField.formula: CASE( Referral_Account__r.Referral_Source_Business_Type__c,'Accounting Firm', IF (NOT(ISBLANK(Referral_Count__c)), CASE (Referral_Count__c, 0, "50 CPA Non-referring" ,1, "30 CPA Referring <3/Year" ,2, "30 CPA Referring <3/Year" ,3, "10 CPA Referring 3-4/Year" ,4, "10 CPA Referring 3-4/Year" ,"5 CPA Referring >4/Year"),"") ,"Financial Services","52 Bank Call" ,"Broker", "76 Money Manager" ,"Insurance Carrier", "70 IIA General" , TEXT(Referral_Type__c) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field demonstrates the Referral Type as calculated directly from the data within Salesforce, unlike the main Referral Type field that is calculated from data in the WAR system.
CustomField.label: Referral Type Test
